name: lyric
categoryDescription: Lyrical Poetry is the poems that express the feelings of excitement that arise and rise in the soul of the poet in a sincere way and are full of emotions.

name: epic
categoryDescription: Epic poetry is the type of poetry that expresses the subjects related to patriotism, valor, heroism and war.

name: didactic
categoryDescription: Didactic poems are instructive poems that are written to impose a certain idea or to give information on a certain subject, to give advice, to teach a moral lesson.

name: pastoral
categoryDescription: Pastoral poetry is a type of poetry that expresses the beauties of nature such as forest, mountain, village and plateau and the feeling of longing for this life.

name: satirical
categoryDescription: It is called satire poems in which the irregularities in the social life, the failing sides, the ineptitude and weaknesses of the people in various subjects are expressed.
